title: Can hackers access your cameras on your computer or mobile phone? - Quora

response.answer_text: Potentially yes. Authorities can call into your phone and turn it on remotely and access the hardware features. American companies are obliged to assist in such activities and usualy do so on a case by case basis. Apple's objection wasnt to hacking the phone, they were happy to do that, they just didn't want to give law inforcement a tool to do it themselves which is what the FBI requested.
